title: In-game resolution does not match my laptop screen resolution
body:
Even though my laptop resolution is 1920 x 1080 (which I have played thousands of league games on), for some reason when I tried to play this afternoon it was really zoomed in. As if I was trying to wrong resolution. Toning the resolution down to 1280 x 720 fixed the issue. However, my laptop screen is in fact 1920 x 1080 (which I checked and rechecked multiple times). 

Really confused about this one.

replies.body:
Is it a 4K?  It's not officially supported for League right now so it's possible to run into issues.  I also suggest resetting your config just in case something corrupted and failing to read your resolution properly.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps!
